AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Plain
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_labelShort} went to public school away from the rich-kids, but not the popular ones. {PAWN_pronoun} did not participate in any clubs or activities. {PAWN_pronoun} graduated high school with mediocre grades near the middle third of {PAWN_possessive} class.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Plain
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_labelShort} was just another mouth to feed.
